face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: How do you think about how to balance it internally if you're trying to get all that?
sentences.chinese: 如果你想面面俱到，该如何保持游戏的平衡性呢？

sentences.english: There are no all-embracing EC directives on race equality.
sentences.chinese: 关于种族平等，欧盟指令也无法面面俱到。

sentences.english: Stop trying to be all things to all people.
sentences.chinese: 不要为所有人面面俱到。

sentences.english: Blair: How do you been so get out of skate?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做到面面俱到的？

sentences.english: In other words, stop trying to be all things to all people.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，不要为所有人面面俱到。
